text: the cctv of the charity shop robbery was filmed on saturday morning .

it 's the fourth time the shop has been targeted in the last two months - and the seventh time in the last 20 months .

text: a project that aims to encourage healthy eating has received a major cash injection .

all profits will then go towards running cooking courses .

text: aaron mauger has said we can expect to find out if owen williams will be staying with leicester tigers within the next few weeks .
